posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content:
Hi all,

Does anyone have this patch (I.71) installed? If so, is it worth it and what does it do?

Inquiring minds need to know!

Thanks in advance

posts.author: grom56
posts.content: What is this patch Stag?   I thought the last patch was 1.69??

posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content:
As did I, Grom, hence the question!

I have had a very helpful PM about this now, but I have no idea about how to replicate it here, so I'll just give you the essence (and hopefully the author of that PM will add it to this thread, hint, hint...).

Apparently it's a mix of bug and spell fixes, along with AI improvements for both henchies and enemies. This, it seems, can lead to problems in some modules - such as discussions not being triggered and high level foes with already decent AI now being untouchable.

I'll try and give you the link here, but I ain't been too successful at this in the past, so no promises...

https://neverwintervault.org/project/nw ... ch-project

posts.author: grom56
posts.content: Stag; the link works fine.   I'll give it a look see when I have time.  Thanks!
